verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord!
Praise the Lord!
Let the earth hear His voice!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord!
Praise the Lord!

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
O come to the Father
Through Jesus the Son;

And give Him the glory,
Great things He hath done!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
To God be the glory!
Great things He hath done!

So lov'd He the world
That He gave us His Son,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Who yielded His life
An atonement for sin,

And open'd the lifegate
That all may go in.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: O perfect redemption, the purchase of blood!
To every believer the promise of God;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: The vilest offender who truly believes,
That moment from Jesus a pardon receives.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Great things He hath taught us,
Great things He hath done,
And great our rejoicing through Jesus the Son:

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines: But purer and higher and greater will be
Our wonder, our worship, when Jesus we see!
